title: Are You Eating Pork Injected With Merck’s mRNA Livestock Vaccine?
cleaned_text: Since 2018, industrial pork producers have been using customizable mRNA-based “vaccines” on their herds. According to drugmaker Merck, the vaccines target “existing and evolving swine pathogens, including diseases not covered by conventional swine vaccines.”

opengraph.title: Are You Eating Pork Injected With Merck’s mRNA Livestock Vaccine?
opengraph.description:
Since 2018, industrial pork producers have been using customizable mRNA-based "vaccines" on their herds. According to drugmaker Merck, the vaccines target “existing and evolving swine pathogens, including diseases not covered by conventional swine vaccines.” 
April 10, 2023 | Source: The Defender | by Dr. Joseph Mercola 

Story
